explanation: The stage direction 'Allégorie des effets d'Apollon et de Jupiter, rapportée au châtiment et à la punition des grands' has a narrative quality. It seems to be describing an allegorical representation involving mythological figures (Apollon and Jupiter) and their influences regarding the punishment of the great. This kind of description has an element of storytelling or narration, which fits the 'narration' category.
stgdir: Allégorie des effets d'Apollon et de Jupiter, rapportée au châtiment et à la punition des grands.
